HOME ABOUT US COLLECTION PROJECTS CONTACT SEARCH LANGUAGE We export the elegance of nature to distinguished projects around the world. OUR STORY Processing the Art of Nature Touching the heart of stone. Years Experience Completed Projects Countries Exported Who is R&Y Stone Export? Show Nero Marquina (China) Marble Tropical Storm Marble Bianco Gioia Marble Bianco Lasa Marble R&Y Stone Export R&Y Stone Export is a foreign trade company built on a deep-rooted family tradition in Turkish Natural Stone exports, with a strong focus on quality and trust. With more than 20 years of industry experience and a strong organizational structure, we deliver high-quality Turkish Natural Stone to many parts of the world. The trust, sustainability, and meticulousness that come from being a family business, combined with our professional approach, enable us to consistently offer our customers the right product at the right time. We manage all processes—from production to packaging, and from loading to shipment—in a transparent manner and in accordance with international quality standards. Our vision is to establish long-term and strong business partnerships by promoting Turkey’s natural stone potential on a global scale. Our mission is to support our customers at every step with the principles of high quality, reliable delivery, and strong communication. At R&Y Stone Export, we do not only export marble; we build value, trust, and long-term business relationships. We aim to provide sustainable contributions to our business partners through the innovative projects we develop. R&Y Stone Export is a foreign trade brand built on strong family values, specializing in the export of high-quality Turkish Natural Stone with a commitment to trust and long-term partnerships. With over 20 years of industry experience, we carefully select premium marble products and add value to prestigious projects around the world by managing every stage of the process—from production to shipment—according to the highest standards.
Specialized in marble, travertine, limestone and onyx, we provide high-quality natural stone solutions for prestigious architectural projects worldwide.
With extensive experience in the natural stone industry, we supply marble, travertine, limestone and onyx for distinguished projects around the world. In addition to blocks, slabs and cut-to-size products, we offer tailor-made production with custom dimensions and surface finishes for architectural applications.
Through our commitment to quality, sustainable sourcing and reliable logistics, we serve architects, contractors and developers in hotel, residential, commercial and public projects as a trusted long-term partner.
In every project, we combine the elegance of nature with technical excellence and lasting performance. TRAVERTINE MARBLE ONYX LIMESTONE Natural stone products may show variations in color, pattern, and veining due to their nature; this is a result of the product's natural origin. Our products can be produced in custom dimensions and with desired surface treatment options according to customer demand. For current pricing information, please contact us. CONTACT US Privacy Policy & GDPR Terms of Use

1. Data Controller

At R&Y Stone Export, we process your personal data in accordance with the GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation).

2. Purpose of Processing

Information collected via contact forms or WhatsApp is used solely for processing your business inquiries and managing export documentation.

3. Your Rights

You have the right to request the deletion or correction of your personal information at any time by contacting us.

1. Usage

By accessing this website, you agree to comply with our business terms regarding natural stone supply.

2. Quotations

Product details provided on this site are for informational purposes. Formal quotations are required for all international orders.

3. Intellectual Property

All designs, stone textures, and logos displayed are the property of R&Y Stone Export.

I have read and agree to the processing of my personal data. You must accept the privacy policy to continue. We use cookies to offer you a better experience. For more information, please see our ACCEPT Frequently Asked Questions Which products do you export? [cite_start]We export marble, travertine and limestone in slab, cut-to-size and project-based custom production options. Which countries do you export to? [cite_start]We export natural stone to many countries, primarily across Europe. Do you offer project-based and custom size production? Yes. We provide tailor-made production for architectural projects, including custom dimensions and surface finishes. Do you work on large-scale and prestigious projects? Yes. We provide natural stone solutions for hotels, residential, commercial and public projects. Is there a minimum order quantity? [cite_start]Minimum order quantities depend on the product type and project scope. Can we request samples? Yes. We can provide samples upon request. What quality standards do your products meet? [cite_start]All our products are subject to quality control processes in compliance with international export standards. In which forms can the products be supplied? [cite_start]Our products can be supplied as blocks, slabs and cut-to-size materials, as well as custom-made products for specific projects. What is the delivery lead time? [cite_start]Delivery times depend on the product type, quantity and project requirements. How are the products packaged and shipped? [cite_start]All products are packaged for international transportation and shipped according to export regulations. Do you provide technical support during the project? Yes. We offer technical consultation and product guidance throughout the project. Can we see your reference projects? Yes. We can share our reference projects upon request. What information is required to receive a quotation? Product type, dimensions, surface finish, quantity and destination country are sufficient. Do you provide after-sales support? Yes. We continue to support our clients after delivery. Back to Projects No projects published yet.
